system.description:
Beginning at 6th level, you may use your magic to temporarily improve your Undead Servant, giving it one of the following upgrades at the cost specified. These upgrades require an action to activate, and last until you complete a long rest. You may not use the same upgrade more than once per long rest, but you may have multiple upgrades active at a time.

Magical Fortitude

You may use a spell slot to give your Undead Servant the ability to reroll one failed saving throw of your choice.

Unnatural Defence

If you use a spell slot while you have a prepared spell from the Protection school, your Undead Servant increases its AC by a number equal to the level of the spell slot used.

Necrotic Power

If you use a spell slot while you have a prepared spell from the Necrotic school, your Undead Servant deals an extra 1d4 + the spell slot level Necrotic damage.
